book_name_Acts.@zh: The Birth and Spread of Christianity

download_info: The following files may be downloaded for study on your personal computer.

site_blurb.@es: A study program designed to improve your understanding of either language through reading and listening.
site_blurb.@zh: Based on the Ancient Writings of the Holy Bible, Suitable for Study of Language, History, Philosophy, and Religion

site_features.A: Read and listen to the text
site_features.B: Compare texts from both languages in parallel
site_features.D: You may download the text and audio for further study
site_features.E: You will be studying notable texts selected from the Bible
site_features.F: Best of all, you are learning the truths of God's word
